Uses of Class
com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode

  • Packages that use AbstractNode 
    Package Description
    com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui  

    • Uses of AbstractNode in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

      Subclasses of AbstractNode in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAlignableGuiNode
      This GUI node can align itself based on an AbstractAlignableGuiNode.Alignment that is set using AbstractAlignableGuiNode.setAlignment(Alignment) it will use the parent node as reference.
      class  GuiButton
      This GUI node is a button it will trigger all listeners when a mouse button is pressed.
      class  GuiContainer
      This GUI node represents a basic container allowing for a background and outline color.
      class  GuiImage
      This GUI node allows for an image within a container.
      class  GuiItemContainer<T extends AbstractItemStack>
      This GUI node represents an item container that displays all the contained items in a grid of item slots.
      class  GuiItemSlot<T extends AbstractItemStack>
      This GUI node represents a item slot, it can contain a stack of items defined by the interface AbstractItemStack.
      class  GuiLabel
      This GUI node represents a container containing text with the ability to auto adjust the container size depending on the size of the text.
      class  GuiList<T>
      This GUI node is a list that has a built-in scrollbar.
      class  GuiProgressBar
      This GUI node is a progress bar that allows for both vertical and horizontal display and allows a value between zero and a given max value.
      class  GuiSelectionList<T>
      This GUI node is a list that has a built-in scrollbar and will retain a selected item upon clicking it.
      class  GuiSlider
      This GUI node represents a slider knob.
      class  GuiText
      This GUI node represents a label containing text.
      class  GuiWindow
      This GUI node is a embedded draggable window that can contain other nodes.
      Methods in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui that return AbstractNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractNode GuiWindow.add(AbstractNode node)
      Redirect added nodes to the GuiWindow.getContents() node instead.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.add(AbstractNode node)
      Adds a child node to this node, this method calls onAdded(AbstractNode), notifies the parent node of a change via onChildNodeChange(AbstractNode) and notifies all children nodes via onParentNodeChange(AbstractNode).
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.bringToFront(AbstractNode node)
      Brings the given node to the end of the children node list within this node.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.getParent()
      Returns the parent node of this node.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.remove(AbstractNode node)
      Removes a child node from this node, this method calls onRemoved(AbstractNode), notifies the parent node of a change via onChildNodeChange(AbstractNode) and notifies all children nodes via onParentNodeChange(AbstractNode).
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.removeChildren()
      Removes all children nodes from this node.
      AbstractNode GuiItemContainer.setEnabled(boolean isEnabled) 
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setEnabled(boolean isEnabled)
      Sets this node as enabled.
      AbstractNode AbstractAlignableGuiNode.setEnabled(boolean isEnabled)
      This method is disabled for AbstractAlignableGuiNode as it will prevent the node from calculating alignment.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setGraphicsCalculationsDirty()
      Requests that renderFirst(Graphics2D) be called to recalculate variables dependent on the graphics context.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setHeight(int height)
      Sets the height of this node.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setKeepWithinParent(boolean keepWithinParent)
      Sets if this node will be kept within the parent node, if this node has no parent the game screen dimensions will be used instead.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setLocalPosition(float x, float y)
      Sets the local position of this node, if the given x and y values are the same as the ones already set this method does nothing.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setLocalPositionX(float x)
      Sets the local x position of this node.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setLocalPositionY(float y)
      Sets the local y position of this node.
      protected AbstractNode AbstractNode.setParent(AbstractNode parent)
      Sets the parent of this node.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setPositionDirty()
      Notifies both this node and all children nodes to update the global position next time getGlobalPosition() is called.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setSize(int width, int height)
      Sets the size of this node, if the given width and height values are the same as the ones already set this method does nothing.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setUsePercentagePositions(boolean usePercentagePositions)
      If set true the local position will be a percentage of the parent dimensions.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setVisible(boolean isVisible)
      Sets if this node is visible, if true this node will be rendered along with all child nodes.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.setWidth(int width)
      Sets the width of this node.
      Methods in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui that return types with arguments of type AbstractNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<AbstractNode> AbstractNode.getChildren()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of child nodes this node contains.
      Methods in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui with parameters of type AbstractNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractNode GuiWindow.add(AbstractNode node)
      Redirect added nodes to the GuiWindow.getContents() node instead.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.add(AbstractNode node)
      Adds a child node to this node, this method calls onAdded(AbstractNode), notifies the parent node of a change via onChildNodeChange(AbstractNode) and notifies all children nodes via onParentNodeChange(AbstractNode).
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.bringToFront(AbstractNode node)
      Brings the given node to the end of the children node list within this node.
      protected void AbstractNode.onAdded(AbstractNode node)
      This method is called when a child node is added to this node.
      protected void GuiList.onChildNodeChange(AbstractNode instigator) 
      protected void AbstractNode.onChildNodeChange(AbstractNode instigator)
      This method is called when a child node changes local position, size, or adds / removes a node.
      protected void AbstractAlignableGuiNode.onChildNodeChange(AbstractNode instigator) 
      protected void AbstractNode.onParentNodeChange(AbstractNode instigator)
      This method is called when A parent node changes local position, size, or adds / removes a node.
      protected void AbstractAlignableGuiNode.onParentNodeChange(AbstractNode instigator) 
      protected void AbstractNode.onRemoved(AbstractNode node)
      This method is called when a child node is removed from this node.
      AbstractNode AbstractNode.remove(AbstractNode node)
      Removes a child node from this node, this method calls onRemoved(AbstractNode), notifies the parent node of a change via onChildNodeChange(AbstractNode) and notifies all children nodes via onParentNodeChange(AbstractNode).
      protected AbstractNode AbstractNode.setParent(AbstractNode parent)
      Sets the parent of this node.
